Effects: +0.2% damage increase for every HP the player is missing
An upgraded Berserkir axes will NOT keep its upgraded level when it is used to craft the Bleeding Berserkir axes using gemstones
An upgraded Berserkir axes will NOT keep its upgraded level when it is used to craft the Thundering Berserkir axes using gemstones
An upgraded Berserkir axes will NOT keep its upgraded level when it is used to craft the Primal Berserkir axes using gemstones
